title: Kingdom Hearts HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue
summary: Kingdom Hearts HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue[lower-alpha 1] is a compilation of games from the Kingdom Hearts series, developed and published by Square Enix in collaboration with Disney Interactive Studios. A successor to the Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 Remix game compilation, the new title was announced in September 2015 and released in January 2017 on PlayStation 4, February 2020 on Xbox One and March 2021 on Microsoft Windows. A cloud version of the game for Nintendo Switch was announced in October 2021.
